output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes - CMF:11240017 is present at the end of the post, indicating this is electoral propaganda material.
2. Refers to candidate: Yes - Explicitly mentions "președintelui Marcel Ciolacu" who is one of the presidential candidates (Position 3).
3. Addresses wide population: Yes - This is a paid advertisement with significant reach (7,000-7,999 impressions) and targets a broad audience discussing national healthcare initiatives.
4. Electoral objective: Yes - The post promotes Marcel Ciolacu's "proiect de țară" and uses campaign slogans like "calea sigura". It's presenting his vision and achievements to influence voters.
5. Journalism: No - This is clearly a promotional message, not journalistic content. It promotes specific political achievements and future promises.
6. Personal opinion: No - This is an official party communication (PSD Dolj) with campaign messaging and CMF number.
Key factors making this electoral propaganda: - Uses official campaign messaging ("calea sigura") - Has CMF number - Promotes a presidential candidate's vision and achievements - Is paid political advertising - Makes future promises typical of campaign materials

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This post constitutes electoral propaganda because: - It has an official CMF number - Directly promotes Marcel Ciolacu's presidential project - Makes campaign promises about healthcare - Uses official campaign slogans - Is paid political advertising reaching thousands - Comes from an official party source (PSD Dolj)
conclusion.message-for-police: PSD Dolj, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin promovarea unui material de propaganda electorala (ID Facebook: 1355346872396754) dupa incheierea perioadei de campanie electorala pentru alegerile prezidentiale. Materialul, publicat ca reclama platita dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, promoveaza explicit candidatul prezidential Marcel Ciolacu si proiectul sau de tara, folosind sloganuri de campanie ("calea sigura"), prezentand promisiuni electorale in domeniul sanatatii si continand numar CMF (11240017), elementele care confirma natura sa de propaganda electorala. Efectul electoral urmarit este clar de influentare a votului in favoarea candidatului PSD la presedintie, prin prezentarea realizarilor si promisiunilor acestuia in domeniul sanatatii.
